name: Groot
text: Flora Colossus — Forced Interrupt: When Groot would take any amount of damage, remove that many growth counters from him. For each growth counter removed this way, prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Groot
text: Growth Spurt — Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10). (Limit once per round.)

name: Fruition
text: Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10).

name: "I am Groot"
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove threat from a scheme equal to the number of growth counters on Groot.

name: "I. AM. GROOT!"
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal damage to an enemy equal to the number of growth counters on Groot.

name: Root Stomp
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, place 1 growth counter on Groot (to a maximum of 10).

name: "We Are Groot"
text: Hero Action: Remove up to 4 growth counters from Groot → choose that many friendly characters. Give each of those characters a tough status card.

name: Fertile Ground
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Fertile Ground → place 1 growth counter on Groot (to a maximum of 10) and draw 1 card.

name: Entangling Vines
text: Hero Interrupt: When Groot makes a basic thwart, remove 1 growth counter from him and exhaust Entangling Vines → Groot gets +2 THW for that thwart.

name: Lashing Vines
text: Hero Response: After Groot uses a basic power, remove 2 growth counters from him and exhaust Lashing Vines → ready Groot.

name: Vine Shield
text: Hero Interrupt: When Groot defends against an attack, remove 1 growth counter from him and exhaust Vine Shield → Groot gets +3 DEF for that attack.

flavor: "We get it, you're Groot." - Rocket Raccoon
name: Vine Spikes
text: Hero Interrupt: When Groot makes a basic attack, remove 1 growth counter from him and exhaust Vine Spikes → Groot gets +2 ATK for that attack.

name: Starhawk
text: Interrupt: When Starhawk takes damage exactly equal to his remaining hit points, return him to your hand.

name: Fighting Fit
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to the villain (5 damage instead if your hero's remaining hit points are equal to or greater than your hero's starting hit points).

name: Dauntless
text:
Play under any player's control.
Max 1 per player.
While your hero's remaining hit points are equal to or greater than your hero's starting hit points, your hero gains retaliate 1.

flavor: "I will die before I yield!" - Drax
name: Hard to Ignore
text: Hero Response: After your hero defends against an attack and takes no damage, exhaust Hard to Ignore → remove 1 threat from the main scheme.

name: Rocket Raccoon
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Interrupt: When Rocket Raccoon attacks a minion, he gets +3 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

name: Flora and Fauna
text: Team-Up (Groot and Rocket Raccoon). Max 1 per deck Hero Action: Place 2 growth counters on Groot (to a maximum of 10) and ready him, or place 2 charge counters on a Rocket Raccoon upgrade and ready that upgrade.

name: Deft Focus
text: Max 1 per player. Hero Action: Exhaust Deft Focus → reduce the resource cost of the next [[superpower]] card you play this turn by 1.

flavor: "That's it! You can attack me, you can call me names, but NO ONE touches my blaster!"
name: Rocket Raccoon
text: "Murdered You!" — Response: After you deal excess damage to an enemy, draw 1 card.

name: Rocket Raccoon
text: Tinkering — Action: Choose and discard a [[tech]] upgrade you control → draw 2 cards. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "No, I thought it'd be funny! Was it funny?" - Rocket Raccoon
name: I've Got a Plan
text: Hero Response: After you make a basic thwart (using your THW), ready Rocket Raccoon. Rocket Raccoon gets +1 THW while in hero form until the end of the phase.

flavor: "Me? I don't really care about people. I spend most of my time shooting at them." - Rocket Raccoon
name: Reload
text: Hero Action: Ready each [[tech]] upgrade you control.

flavor: "I live for the simple things... like how much this is gonna hurt." - Rocket Raccoon
name: Schadenfreude
text: Hero Action: Until the end of the turn, heal 2 damage from Rocket Raccoon each time you deal any amount of damage to an enemy.

name: Salvage
text: Response: After you spend this card, put a [[tech]] upgrade from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Battery Pack
text: Enters play with 2 charge counters on it. Action: Exhaust Battery Pack → move a charge counter from this card to another [[tech]] upgrade you control.

flavor: "Yeah, yeah, look at the freak while you can." - Rocket Raccoon
name: Cybernetic Skeleton
text:
You get +3 hit points.
While in hero form, Rocket Raccoon gets +1 ATK.

name: Particle Cannon
text: Restricted. Enters play with 2 charge counters on it. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Particle Cannon and remove 1 charge counter from it → deal 4 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill and ranged.

name: Rocket Launcher
text: Restricted. Enters play with 2 charge counters on it. Hero Action: Exhaust Rocket Launcher and remove 1 charge counter from it → choose a player. Deal 2 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player.

name: Rocket's Pistol
text: Restricted. Enters play with 3 charge counters on it. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Rocket's Pistol and remove 1 charge counter from it → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Even from up here, I can tell that you're the ugliest human I've ever seen. And I hang out with Peter Quill." - Rocket Raccoon
name: Thruster Boots
text: While in hero form, Rocket Raccoon gets +1 THW and gains the [[aerial]] trait.

flavor: "Whoopee! We're a *tik* team again! There ain't no way they can *tik* stop us now!"
name: Bug
text: Hero Response: After your hero makes a basic attack, heal 1 damage from Bug.

name: Looking for Trouble
text: Hero Action (thwart): Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Put that minion into play engaged with you → remove 3 threat from the main scheme.

name: Follow Through
text: Hero Interrupt: When your hero's attack deals any amount of excess damage, increase that amount by 1.

name: Hand Cannon
text: Restricted. Uses (3 charge counters). Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic attack, exhaust Hand Cannon and remove 1 charge counter from it → your hero gets +2 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

name: Groot
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Response: After Groot defends against an attack, heal 2 damage from him.

name: Booster Boots
text: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Max 1 per player. Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust Booster Boots and discard the top card of your deck → prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Brainstorm
text: Unit Cost 1. Hero Action (thwart): name a card type, then look at the top card of your deck. If that card is of named type, remove 3 threat from the main scheme. Place that card on the top or bottom of your deck, then draw 1 card.

name: By Any Means
text: Unit Cost 1. Hero Action (attack): Place 2 threat on the main scheme. Deal 3 damage to the villain. Draw 1 card.

name: Contingency Plan
text: Unit Cost 1. Hero Action (attack): Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. For each different resource type discarded this way, deal 1 damage to an enemy. Draw 1 card.

name: In Defiance
text: Unit Cost 1. Hero Interrupt: When an identity would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent 2 of that damage. Draw 1 card.

name: Calculate the Odds
text: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Draw 1 card and choose a player. That player may draw 1 card, then choose and discard 1 card from their hand.

name: Creative Solution
text: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Draw 1 card and remove a status card from any character. If the status card type removed this way was: - Tough - Deal 3 damage to an enemy. - Stun - Remove 3 threat from a scheme. - Confuse - Heal 3 damage from an identity.

name: Grapple
text: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to an enemy and stun it. Stun your hero. Draw 1 card.

name: Wing It
text: Unit Cost 2. Hero Action: Deal 1 damage to an enemy and confuse it. Confuse your hero. Draw 1 card.

name: Close Call
text: Unit Cost 3. Hero Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, cancel that card's "Boost" ability and all of its boost icons ([boost]), then discard it. Draw 1 card.

name: Defy Danger
text: Unit Cost 3. Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy and discard the top card of the encounter deck? Take 1 damage for each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: In Harm's Way
text: Unit Cost 3. Hero Action (thwart): Take 2 damage. Remove 5 threat from a scheme.

name: Take the Fight to Them
text: Unit Cost 3. Hero Action: Look at the top 2[per_hero] cards of the encounter deck. Discard any number of those, then place the rest on the top and/or bottom of the encounter deck in any order. Draw 1 card.

name: Armor Plating
text: Unit Cost 4. Hero Interrupt: When an identity would take any amount of damage, exhaust Armor Plating → prevent 1 of that damage (2 of that damage instead if you control the Milano).

name: Heavy Cannon
text: Unit Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Heavy Cannon → deal 1 damage to each enemy. If you control the Milano, deal 1 additional damage to the villain.

name: Hyper Thrusters
text: Unit Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Hyper Thrusters → remove 1 theat from each scheme. If you control the Milano, remove 1 additional threat from the main scheme.

name: Reactor Core
text: Unit Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Reactor Core and discard the top 2 cards of your deck (the top card instead if you control the Milano) → reduce the resource cost of the next event you play this turn by 1.

name: Ardent Resolve
text: Unit Cost 5. Hero Action: Ready a friendly character. Draw 1 card.

name: Onrush
text: Unit Cost 5. Hero Interrupt: When a card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel the effects of that card and discard it.

name: Safeguard
text: Unit Cost 5. Hero Action: Give up to 2 friendly characters each a tough status card. Draw 1 card.

name: Sure Gamble
text: Unit Cost 5. Hero Action: Reduce the resource cost of the next card played this phase by 3.

name: Cargo Hold
text: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Cargo Hold → heal 1 damage from a friendly character. If you control the Milano, heal 1 damage from you identity.

name: Mounted Laser
text: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Mounted Laser → deal 2 damage to an enemy (3 damage instead if you control the Milano).

name: Navigation Column
text: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Navigation Column, choose and discard 1 card from your hand (discard the top card of your deck instead if you control the Milano) → draw 1 card.

name: Targeting Screen
text: Unit Cost 6. Hero Action: Exhaust Targeting Screen → remove 2 threat from a scheme (3 threat instead if you control the Milano).

name: Grand Strategy
text: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Draw up to your maximum hand size. Remove this card from the game.

name: Power Unleashed
text: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Deal 5 damage to the villain and remove 5 threat from the main scheme. Remove this card from the game.

name: Tried and True
text: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Choose a player. That player may add up to 3 cards from their discard pile to their hand. Remove this card from the game.

name: Triple Threat
text: Unit Cost 7. Hero Action: Ready up to 3 characters. Remove this card from the game.
